{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (60, 6), size = (600, 28), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_TOP, text = 0), # index 0 is the hdd_description MultiContentEntryText(pos = (80, 44), size = (720, 25), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_BOTTOM, text = 2), # index 2 is the device info MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (2, 8), size = (55, 55), png = 7), # index 3 is the device pixmap MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (58, 46), size = (15, 16), png = 8), # index 4 is the online state pixmap MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (0, 73), size = (780, 2), png = 9), # index 3 is the div pixmap ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 28),gFont("Regular", 20)], "itemHeight": 75 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 2), size = (420, 25), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 0), # index 0 is the name ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 22),gFont("Regular", 18)], "itemHeight": 30 }

screen:
{"templates": {"default": (100,[ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (10, 12), size = (100, 75), png = 4), # index 4 is the thumbnail MultiContentEntryText(pos = (120, 10), size = (630, 25), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 1), # index 1 is the Title MultiContentEntryText(pos = (120, 40), size = (370, 20), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 5, color=0x8A8787, color_sel=0x8A8787), # index 5 is the Published Date MultiContentEntryText(pos = (120, 70), size = (370, 20), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 6, color=0x8A8787, color_sel=0x8A8787), # index 6 is the Views Count MultiContentEntryText(pos = (490, 40), size = (255, 20), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 7, color=0x8A8787, color_sel=0x8A8787), # index 7 is the duration MultiContentEntryText(pos = (490, 70), size = (255, 20), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 8, color=0x8A8787, color_sel=0x8A8787), # index 8 is the ratingcount ]), "state": (100,[ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 10), size = (735, 28), font=2, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 0), # index 0 is the name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 40), size = (735, 50), font=3, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 1, color=0x8A8787, color_sel=0x8A8787), # index 2 is the description ]) }, "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 22),gFont("Regular", 18),gFont("Regular", 26),gFont("Regular", 20)], "itemHeight": 100 }
# fake entry for dynamic thumbnail resizing, currently there is no other way doing this.

widget.convert: {"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 1), size = (420, 25), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 0), # index 0 is the name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (440, 1), size = (180, 24), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 1), # index 1 are the rtesults ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 22),gFont("Regular", 18)], "itemHeight": 25 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 3), size = (250, 24), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # index 1 is the name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (270, 3), size = (180, 24), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 2), # index 2 is the state MultiContentEntryProgress(pos = (460, 3), size = (150, 24), percent = -3), # index 3 should be progress MultiContentEntryText(pos = (630, 3), size = (120, 24), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 4), # index 4 is the percentage ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 22),gFont("Regular", 18)], "itemHeight": 30 }
